To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.



?Game description
?Meru Purana? is a simulation game set in Central Asia and based on Indian mythology, making it unique among games in its genre. It also features an epic story of 108 warriors vying for dominance of Mt. Mael and an expansive plain. With a refined system and simplified command groups, this title delivers an extremely player-friendly game environment! And its background music features famous works that are somehow melancholy. What will the warriors behold at the end of their seemingly eternal battle?

?Not compatible with Multitap
?For playing with PSP®, single player game play only. Not compatible with multiple user play.
